title: Bounder (1C286)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Ally • Home 2 • Hobbit
Strength:	2
Vitality:	2
Site:	2
Game Text:	Skirmish: Exert this ally to prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless that Hobbit's strength is tripled.
Lore:	”'Aye, reckon we're in for a quiet night … mind how you go.'”
Rarity:	C
